sections.info: A strange property in [[Yoyleland]] seems to be taking Objects from a completely different universe and putting them in [[Yoyleland]], it seems that this object had that happen to them but it is unknown where they come from.
sections.obtaining: Go into Yoyleland, then start walking left and you will see Boombox in a field of Yoyle Bushes.

wiki_markup:
[[File:YoylelandRealm.png|2000px]]
{{CharacterInfo |name=Boombox |character= Boombox.webp|Current Boombox.png|Old |difficulty=[[File:Effortless.png|link=]] '''Effortless''' |area=[[Yoyleland]] |hint=buy our new leafy detector |additionalinfo }} == Info == A strange property in [[Yoyleland]] seems to be taking Objects from a completely different universe and putting them in [[Yoyleland]], it seems that this object had that happen to them but it is unknown where they come from. == Obtaining == Go into Yoyleland, then start walking left and you will see Boombox in a field of Yoyle Bushes.
